fields.title: Avengers: Endgame
fields.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
fields.plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.

fields.title: Pokémon Detective Pikachu
fields.genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Mystery, Sci-Fi
fields.actors: Ryan Reynolds, Justice Smith, Kathryn Newton, Bill Nighy
fields.plot: In a world where people collect Pokémon to do battle, a boy comes across an intelligent talking Pikachu who seeks to be a detective.

fields.title: The Hustle
fields.actors: Anne Hathaway, Rebel Wilson, Tim Blake Nelson, Alex Sharp
fields.plot: Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson star as female scam artists, one low rent and the other high class, who team up to take down the dirty rotten men who have wronged them.

fields.title: The Intruder
fields.actors: Meagan Good, Dennis Quaid, Michael Ealy, Joseph Sikora
fields.plot: A young married couple buy a beautiful house on several acres of land only to find out that the man they bought it from refuses to let go of the property.

fields.title: Long Shot
fields.actors: Charlize Theron, Seth Rogen, June Diane Raphael, O'Shea Jackson Jr.
fields.plot: When Fred Flarsky reunites with his first crush, one of the most influential women in the world, Charlotte Field, he charms her. As she prepares to make a run for the Presidency, Charlotte hires Fred as her speechwriter and sparks fly.

fields.title: Poms
fields.actors: Diane Keaton, Pam Grier, Charlie Tahan, Rhea Perlman
fields.plot: 45 minutes outside of Phoenix lies a retirement community. A place where palm trees line the streets, the skies are always clear and the "taxi" (ambulance) drives by two or three times a day - a final destination for retirees. This is the story of America's first cheer-leading squad for women aged 60.

fields.title: UglyDolls
fields.genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical
fields.actors: Kelly Clarkson, Nick Jonas, Janelle Monáe, Blake Shelton
fields.plot: An animated adventure in which the free-spirited UglyDolls confront what it means to be different, struggle with a desire to be loved, and ultimately discover who you truly are is what matters most.

fields.title: Breakthrough
fields.actors: Topher Grace, Chrissy Metz, Marcel Ruiz, Josh Lucas
fields.plot: When her 14-year-old son drowns in a lake, a faithful mother prays for him to come back from the brink of death and be healed.

fields.title: Tolkien
fields.actors: Lily Collins, Nicholas Hoult, Patrick Gibson, Pam Ferris
fields.plot: Tolkien explores the formative years of the orphaned author as he finds friendship, love and artistic inspiration among a group of fellow outcasts at school.

fields.title: Les Crevettes Pailletées
fields.actors: Nicolas Gob, Alban Lenoir, Geoffrey Couët, Michaël Abiteboul
fields.plot: Matthias Le Goff, an Olympic champion at the end of his career, makes a homophobic statement on TV. His punishment: coach the Shiny Shrimps, a flamboyant and amateur gay water-polo team. They have only one thing in mind: to qualify for the Gay Games in Croatia where the hottest international LGBT athletes compete. It's the start of a bumpy and joyful ride - Faster, Higher, Stronger.

fields.plot: Tessa Young is an 18 year old college student with a simple life, excellent grades, and a sweet boyfriend. She always has things planned out ahead of time, until she meets a rude boy named Hardin, with too many tattoos and piercings who shatters her plans.

fields.title: Met Opera: Dialogues Des Carmelites
fields.actors: Maria Ewing, Régine Crespin, Jessye Norman
fields.plot: Fathom Events and The Met: Live in HD present a broadcast of Poulenc’s Dialogues des Carmélites, live in select cinemas nationwide on Saturday, May 11. Met Music Director Yannick Nézet-Séguin leads an accomplished ensemble in Poulenc’s devastating modern masterpiece of faith and martyrdom. Isabel Leonard is the young Blanche de La Force, opposite Met legend Karita Mattila as the First Prioress.

fields.plot: The success of the Sexo Delícia franchise makes Alice (Ingrid Guimarães) ride the world, visit the countries of origin in an endless rush. Without time to dedicate herself to the family, who takes over a house with her husband João Paulo, who takes care of her children Paulinho (Eduardo Mello) and Clarinha (Duda Batista), who is six years old. Tired of all the hustle and bustle, Alice decides, Marion (Denise Weinberg). However, the emergence of Leona (Samya Pascotto), a young competitor, makes her own plans.
